chapter.title: Sample prerequisites
chapter.para: In order to run the examples you need a working Hadoop installation based on hadoop 2.0.3 and JDK 1.6+ installed on the machine that runs the samples.
For instructions on installing Hadoop refer to your distribution documentation or you can refer to the Getting Started section of this for instructions based off the Apache download distribution.
Currently some of the demos depends on files which needs to exist on HDFS prior to running examples.
